//Md. Ahsan Kabir Shohagh
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz 100000
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define fread freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fwrite freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define inf (1<<29)
#define mem(abc,z) memset(abc,z,sizeof(abc))
#define PI acos(-1)
#define quick ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0)
bool divisible(ll a, ll b){
   if(__gcd(a,b)==1){
      return b==1LL;
   }
   return divisible(a ,b/__gcd(a,b));
}
int main(){
  int t;
  ll a,b;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
    cin>>a>>b;
    if(divisible(a,b)) puts("Yes");
    else puts("No");
  }
  return 0;
}
/*
6
120 75
128 16
7 8
1 11
11 1
2 4
*/
